TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Fangafangasan, title = Fangafangasan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fangafangasan} }

S.FORM: Fangafangasan Itiniay i Chishang Cen no Taitung ko Fangafangasan a niyaro', 376 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 1,013 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 22% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 222 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 78% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 791 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 18%, Bunun 2%, Paiwan 1%, Truku 1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Fangafangasan Itiniay i Chishang Cen no Taitong ko Fangafangasan a niyaro', 376 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 1,013 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 22% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 222 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 78% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 791 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 18%, Bonon 2%, Paiwan 1%, Troko 1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
